body_html:
Since TF has to be build from source on big endian anyway, can we do this: If building build_pip_package for a BE system, remove the grpcio dependency from the generated setup.py.

This will break things that actually depend on grpcio, so we'd have to make those failures soft(er), for instance, the debugger may just error out on big endian systems, but TF import shouldn't be affected.

@namrata-ibm do you think that would be workable?
